LOCATION: FLIGHT PATH LEARNING CENTER MUSEUM
6661 W. IMPERIAL HWY LOS ANGELES, CA 90245
PRODUCTION CONTACTS
Production Mar: Mark Aboot. cel 213-952-4355.
Producer: Susan Gross. cell: 310-729-3703
Additional Production Cells:
310-666-6740. 310-666-6294
L.A. THOMAS GUIDE PAGE
702/F7
405
Fairmont Hotel
Santa Monica, CA 90401
405
Wilshire Bivd.
10
10
Century BI.
105
Directions:
Location:
Flight Path Learning Center Museum
Los Angeles, CA 90245
From The Westin Los Angeles Airport Hotel:
1. Turn LEFT onto Century Bivd and follow approx. 1.2 Miles
staying in the RIGHT lanes and following signs to
Sepulveda BIvd SOUTH..
2. Turn LEFT onto Sepulveda Blvd and follow approx.
0.8 Miles staying to Imperial Hwy.
3. Turn RIGHT on Imperial Hwy to the first LIGHT which is California.
4. Turn RIGHT on at the light then make an IMMEDIATE LEFT
onto the frontage road. and follow approx
800 feet to the location on your RIGHT.
5. Park as Directed by production.
note
The Westin Los Angeles Airport
5400 W Century Blvd
- 100.216.85, A 90045
Please note:
We are filming on airport secure
property. TSA requires everyone to
show acceptable proof of identification
with a Government issued photo
I.D., Drivers License or Passport to gain
access to the filming area. Do not forget
to bring your identification or you will be
denied entry.
From the Fairmont Hotel:
1. Turn LEFT on Wilshire Bivd to 4th Street
2. Turn RIGHT on 4th Street and travel approx. 0.7 to
The 10 Fwy. WEST.
3. Take the 10 Fwy WEST approx. 3.4 Miles to the
405 Fwy SOUTH.
4. Take the 405 Fwy SOUTH approx. 7.9 Miles to the
105 Fwy WEST.
5. Take the 105 Fwy WEST approx. 2 Miles until it
Becomes Imperial Hwy at California (1st Light).
6. Turn RIGHT on California then make an IMMEDIATE
LEFT onto the frontage road and travel 800 ft to
location on your RIGHT.
7. Park as Directed by Production.
#HOSPITALS
Daniel Freeman Memorial Medical Center 4650 Lincoln BI, Marina del Rey, CA (310) 823-8911 TBG: 672/B7
